'''Conversions''' replace a character's [[Normal Attack|Normal]], [[Charged Attack|Charged]], and [[Plunging Attack|Plunging]] Attack with a different set of attacks. Converted attacks cannot be overridden by [[Elemental Infusion]]s.

Conversions are not to be confused with Elemental Infusions, as the latter does not replace characters' attacks, and instead only changes the damage type of existing Normal/Charged/Plunging Attacks.

Converted attacks can range from being completely different from the default attacks (e.g., [[Tartaglia]]'s [[Foul Legacy: Raging Tide|Elemental Skill]], [[Cyno]]'s [[Sacred Rite: Wolf's Swiftness|Elemental Burst]]) to being visually similar (e.g., [[Alhaitham]]'s Chisel-Light Mirrors, [[Aloy]]'s [[Frozen Wilds|Elemental Skill]]). However, even if converted attacks are visually similar, it is possible to tell them apart from regular Elemental Infusions using [[Elemental Sight]], as characters affected by a conversion will ''not'' have their weapon highlighted in the element's corresponding color.
